mapper.select: SELECT btt.bid_item_id AS bidItemId, btt.bid_item_name AS bidItemName, btt.bid_item_desc AS bidItemDesc, btt.start_price AS startPrice, btt.max_price AS maxPrice, btt.bid_start_date AS bidStartDate, btt.bid_end_date AS bidEndDate, btt.item_status AS itemStatus, btt.created_by as memberId, btt.cid AS itemCategoryId, bii.bid_img_name as bidImgName, bii.bid_img_url as bidImgUrl, bii.bid_ori_img_name as bidOriImgName FROM bid_items_tbl btt join bid_item_img bii on btt.bid_item_id = bii.bid_item_id where bii.bid_repimg_yn = 'Y'
